quagga.input.subject: RE: Aquila Question 10.19.00
quagga.input.body:
---------------------- Forwarded by Don Miller/HOU/ECT on 10/19/2000 06:14 PM 
---------------------------


"Daigh, John" <JDaigh@utilicorp.com> on 10/19/2000 09:43:45 AM
To: "'Don.Miller@enron.com'" <Don.Miller@enron.com>
cc: "Frantz, Rick" <RFrantz@utilicorp.com> 
Subject: RE: Aquila Question 10.19.00


Don, to be more specific....
1) Are the units started in parallel or sequence? (Could you please provide
a diagram of the ramp-up sequence to include timing)
2) How much start up power is required?
3) Is start up power purchased from Cinergy &/or IPL?  At what tariff rate?
4) How many Mwh are produced during start up? (May include as part of #1)
5) How much fuel is burned (MMBTU's) during start up?(May include as part of
#1)

Thanks for your help Don.
John
-----Original Message-----
From: Daigh, John
Sent: Thursday, October 19, 2000 8:49 AM
To: 'Don.Miller@enron.com'
Cc: Frantz, Rick
Subject: Aquila Question 10.19.00


Can all four units at Wheatland be started simultaneously?
